text: Samuel Hoskins Merrill (born May 15, 1996) is an American professional basketball player for the Cleveland Cavaliers of the National Basketball Association (NBA). Nicknamed “Sammy Buckets” or "Money Merrill", he was drafted with the last pick of the 2020 NBA draft . He played college basketball at Utah State University (USU). title: Sam Merrill
